infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos of rental items and verification documents.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select images for rental listings.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to show nearby rental items and for pickup/delivery coordination.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs microphone access for voice messages in chat.

meta.og:title: Rentat - Rent anything, anytime
meta.og:description: Find and rent items from verified owners in your area. Secure payments, easy rentals.
meta.twitter:title: Rentat - Rent anything, anytime
meta.twitter:description: Find and rent items from verified owners in your area. Secure payments, easy rentals.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Rentat to access your location to show nearby rental items and coordinate pickups.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share rental item images.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos of rental items.
